concept.title: Specify a 3D View
concept.shortdesc: You can set a 3D view to facilitating verifying the 3D effects of the drawing, constructing and visualizing 3D models.

conbody.p: An isometric view is a typical viewpoint that helps you create a 3D view which reduces the number of visually overlapping objects. You can specify a new viewpoint to create new objects or modify the existing objects.
